roleset.name: to let fall in drops, dripping
roleset.note: DRIBBLE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'dribble' based on dictionary.com. (from dribble.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: ARG0
example.text: And if you usually get your amateur kicks from ' audition ' type scenes but hate the lechy dribblings of a sleazy director which often make the girls uncomfortable then Melanie 's friendly , pressure free style is a real breath of fresh air .
example.arg: which often make the girls uncomfortable

example.name: Arg1
example.text: The water's dribbling through the roof caused severe damage to the carpet.

roleset.name: bounce a ball
roleset.note: DRIBBLING-N NOTES: comparison to verb-bounce.01. (from dribbling.02-n)

example.name: dribble-v
example.text: He dribbled the ball down the court and passed it to a man in a corner.

example.name: dribbling-n
example.text: His dribbling has gone down but his goal ratio has skyrocketed to record heights.
